system.description:
Downtown Hub Move

When you go drinking downtown hoping to network with wealthy/powerful, roll with Heart.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: Overindulge in your worst vice; MC determines consequences.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: Meet someone connected to NPC of your choice. They help if you help first; +1 ongoing to persuade if you agree to small favor.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: Meet someone connected to NPC of your choice. They become friends and agree to one favor.
